name: It's Not A Banana!!
description:
Programming: Vicente O'Neill & Patrick Gannon
Art: Vicente O'Neill

IT'S NOT A BANANA.You unwittingly entered the enclosure for the tasty treat only to find it

to be a fake toy. Now the walls have risen and the Genetically Mutated Proboscis Monkeys

have spotted you, and what's more, they’re hungry. Escape? There is none, but maybe you’ll

be able to survive long enough to die with the taste of pride in your mouth.

It's not a banana is a simple top down survival score shooter. Avoid monkeys with your

frantic movement (WASD keys), dash (spacebar) and banana (fake). Aim your banana with

mouse and throw with mouse click to remain alpha and survive. Build up a combo by hitting

multiple Monkeys within a short amount of time to rack up higher scores. The Genetically

Mutated Proboscis Monkeys never stop coming, so stay on the move and land some good

throws to keep them off your back. Your highest score will always be saved and you can

easily restart the game by pressing ‘R’.

With hand crafted assets made for purpose, everything minus the music was made for

ScoreSpace Jam #15.

Royalty free music made by the legendary Kevin Macleod of Incompetech.

Chill Wave by Kevin Macleod

https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3498-chill-wave

Killing Time by Kevin MacLeod

https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3953-killing-time


Controls:

W A S D -- Move

Space -- Dash
Mouse -- Aim
Left Click -- Shoot
R -- Return to menu (When dead)
